The description text in the Download progress toast for showing the number of files (1$) and download progress (2$). This string only consists of two placeholders for purposes of displaying two other strings side-by-side where 1$ is Downloads.Toast.MultipleFiles.DescriptionText and 2$ is Downloads.Toast.Progress.DescriptionText. This string should only consist of the two placeholders side-by-side separated by a single space and 1$ should come before 2$ everywhere except for right-to-left locales.

trans-unit.source: Websites may load outside ads, videos, and other content that contains hidden trackers. Blocking this can make websites load faster, but some buttons, forms, and login fields, might not work.
trans-unit.target: Webbplatser kan ladda externa annonser, videor och annat innehåll som innehåller dolda spårare. Om du blockerar detta kan webbplatser ladda snabbare, men vissa knappar, formulär och inloggningsfält kanske inte fungerar.
trans-unit.note: Description of content trackers.

trans-unit.source: These cookies follow you from site to site to gather data about what you do online. They are set by third parties such as advertisers and analytics companies.
trans-unit.target: Dessa kakor följer dig från sida till sida för att samla in data om vad du gör online. De anges av tredje part som annonsörer och analysföretag.
trans-unit.note: Description of cross-site trackers.

trans-unit.source: Cryptominers secretly use your system’s computing power to mine digital money. Cryptomining scripts drain your battery, slow down your computer, and can increase your energy bill.
trans-unit.target: Kryptogrävare använder ditt systems datakraft för att utvinna digitala pengar. Kryptogrävar-skript tömmer ditt batteri, slöar ner din dator och kan öka energiräkningen.
trans-unit.note: Description of cryptominers.

trans-unit.source: The settings on your browser and computer are unique. Fingerprinters collect a variety of these unique settings to create a profile of you, which can be used to track you as you browse.
trans-unit.target: Inställningarna i din webbläsare och dator är unika. Fingeravtrycksspårare samlar in en mängd av dessa unika inställningar för att skapa en profil om dig, som kan användas för att spåra dig när du surfar.
trans-unit.note: Description of fingerprinters.

trans-unit.source: Social networks place trackers on other websites to build a more complete and targeted profile of you. Blocking these trackers reduces how much social media companies can see what do you online.
trans-unit.target: Sociala nätverk placerar spårare på andra webbplatser för att skapa en mer fullständig och riktad profil för dig. Att blockera dessa spårare minskar hur mycket sociala medieföretag kan se vad du gör online.
trans-unit.note: Description of social network trackers.

Button text to dismiss the dialog box that gets presented as a confirmation to to remove card and cancel the the operation.

Button text to dismiss the dialog box that gets presented as a confirmation to to remove card and perform the operation of removing the credit card.
The title for the negative action of the restore tabs pop-up alert. This alert shows when opening up Firefox after it crashed, and will reject the action of restoring tabs.
The title for the affirmative action of the restore tabs pop-up alert. This alert shows when opening up Firefox after it crashed, and will restore existing tabs.

trans-unit.source: Sorry about that. Restore tabs to pick up where you left off.
trans-unit.target: Förlåt för det. Återställ flikar för att fortsätta där du slutade.
trans-unit.note: The body of the restore tabs pop-up alert. This alert shows when opening up Firefox after it crashed.

trans-unit.target: %@ kraschade. Vill du återställa dina flikar?
trans-unit.note: The title of the restore tabs pop-up alert. This alert shows when opening up Firefox after it crashed. The placeholder will be the Firefox name.

Biometric authentication is when the system prompts users for Face ID or fingerprint before accessing protected information. This string asks the user to enter their device passcode to access the protected screen.
Action button for deleting bookmarks in the bookmarks panel.
Button label to cancel deletion when the user tried to delete a non-empty folder.
Button label for the button that deletes a folder and all of its children.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?
trans-unit.target: Är du säker på att du vill ta bort den och dess innehåll?
trans-unit.note: Main body of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.

trans-unit.target: Den här mappen är inte tom.
trans-unit.note: Title of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
Title label for the view where user can edit their credit card info
Title label for the view where user can add their credit card info
Button label for cancelling editing of the credit card details shown in the form
Title label for user to input their credit card Expiration date in the format MM / YY printed on their credit card in the text box below.
Title label for user to input their credit card number printed on their credit card in the text box below.
Button label for closing the view where user can view their credit card info
Label for copying contents of the form
Button label for editing the credit card details shown in the form
Label for credit card expiration date. The %@ will be replaced by the actual date and thus doesn't need translation.
Title label for user to input their name printed on their credit card in the text box below.
Button title which, when tapped, will allow the user to save valid credit card details.
Title label for button that allows user to remove their saved credit card.
Button label for saving the credit card details user entered in the form

trans-unit.source: Find something nearby. Or discover something fun.
trans-unit.target: Hitta något i närheten. Eller upptäck något roligt.
trans-unit.note: Body of notification send to user after inactivity to encourage them to use the search feature.
Title of notification send to user after inactivity to encourage them to use the search feature.
Sub label error string that gets shown when user enters incorrect input for their expiration date on their credit card in the text box.
Sub label error string that gets shown when user enters incorrect input for their number printed on their credit card in the text box.
Sub label error string that gets shown when user enters incorrect input for their name printed on their credit card in the text box.

trans-unit.source: Meet your personalized homepage. Recent tabs, bookmarks, and search results will appear here.
trans-unit.target: Möt din personliga startsida. Senaste flikar, bokmärken och sökresultat kommer att visas här.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. This one talks about additions to the Firefox homepage regarding a more personalized experience.

trans-unit.source: Your tabs are syncing! Pick up where you left off on your other device.
trans-unit.target: Dina flikar synkroniseras! Fortsätt där du slutade på din andra enhet.
trans-unit.note: Contextual hints are little popups that appear for the users informing them of new features. When a user is logged in and has a tab synced from desktop, this popup indicates which tab that is within the Jump Back In section.
Fallback Title of notification if no notification title was configured. The notification is an advise to the user. The argument is the app name.
String used to describe the option to continue to ask for the notification permission in Firefox Onboarding screens.

trans-unit.source: Send tabs between your devices and get tips about how to get the most out of %@.
trans-unit.target: Skicka flikar mellan dina enheter och få tips om hur du får ut det mesta av %@.
trans-unit.note: String used to describe the description of the notification onboarding page in our Onboarding screens. Placeholder is for the app name.
String used to describe the option to skip the notification permission in Firefox Onboarding screens.

trans-unit.source: Notifications help you do more with %@
trans-unit.target: Notiser hjälper dig att göra mer med %@
trans-unit.note: String used to describe the title of the notification onboarding page in our Onboarding screens. Placeholder is for the app name.

trans-unit.source: Please help make %@ better by taking a short survey.
trans-unit.target: Hjälp till att göra %@ bättre genom att svara på en kort undersökning.
trans-unit.note: On the Research Survey popup, the text that explains what the screen is about. Placeholder is for the app name.
On the Research Survey popup, the text for the button that, when tapped, will dismiss the popup and take the user to a survey.
On the Research Survey popup, the text for the button that, when tapped, will dismiss this screen, and the user will not be taken to the survey.

When making a new search from the awesome bar, search results appear as the user write new letters in their search. Different sections with results from the selected search engine will appear. This string will be used as a header to separate the selected engine search results from current search query.

When making a new search from the awesome bar, search results appear as the user write new letters in their search. This string will be used as a header for Google search results listed as suggestions.

trans-unit.source: Save your card information securely to check out faster next time.
trans-unit.target: Spara din kortinformation säkert för att checka ut snabbare nästa gång.
trans-unit.note: Description label for when there are no credit cards shown in credit card list in autofill settings screen.
Title label for when there are no credit cards shown in credit card list in autofill settings screen. %@ is the product name and should not be altered.

trans-unit.target: %1$@ som slutar på %2$@, utfärdat till %3$@, upphör %4$@
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for a credit card list item in autofill settings screen. The first parameter is the credit card type (e.g. Visa). The second parameter is the last 4 digits of the credit card. The third parameter is the name of the credit card holder. The fourth and fifth parameters are the month and year of the credit card's expiration date.

When a user is in the process or has finished making a purchase with a card not saved in Firefox's list of stored cards, we ask the user if they would like to save this card for future purchases. This string indicates to users that they can deny Firefox from remembering the card that is being used.

trans-unit.target: Kommer du ihåg det här kortet?
trans-unit.note: When a user is in the process or has finished making a purchase with a card not saved in Firefox's list of stored cards, we ask the user if they would like to save this card for future purchases. This string is a title string of the overall message that asks the user if they would like Firefox to remember the card that is being used.

When a user is in the process or has finished making a purchase with a remembered card, and if the credit card information doesn't match the contents of the stored information of that card, we show this string. We ask this user if they would like Firefox update the staled information of that credit card.

When a user is in the process or has finished making a purchase with a card not saved in Firefox's list of stored cards, we ask the user if they would like to save this card for future purchases. This string asks users to confirm if they would like Firefox to remember the card that is being used.

When a user is in the process or has finished making a purchase, and has at least one card saved, we show this tappable string. This indicates to users that they can navigate to their list of stored credit cards in the app's credit card list screen.

When a user is in the process of making a purchase, and has at least one saved card, we show this label used as a title. This indicates to the user that there are stored cards available for use on this pending purchase.

When a user is in the process of making a purchase, and has at least one saved card, we show this label inside the keyboard hint. This indicates to the user that there are stored cards available for use on this pending purchase.

trans-unit.source: This must be turned on to receive tabs and get notified when you sign in on another device.
trans-unit.target: Detta måste vara aktiverat för att ta emot flikar och få en notis när du loggar in på en annan enhet.
trans-unit.note: This is the description for the setting that toggles Sync related notifications in the settings menu under the Notifications section.
This is the title for the setting that toggles Sync related notifications in the settings menu under the Notifications section.

trans-unit.source: You turned off all %1$@ notifications. Turn them on by going to device Settings > Notifications > %2$@
trans-unit.target: Du stängde av alla %1$@-notiser. Slå på dem genom att gå till enhetens Inställningar > Notiser > %2$@
